---
title: "Retrieve NFT Collections Owned by an Account"
---



import { Aside } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';





`GetAccountNftCollections` fetches detailed information about NFT collections owned by a specific account address. This includes data such as the collection ID, distinct token count within each collection, and detailed attributes of each collection. It&apos;s particularly useful for applications that need to display comprehensive details about NFT holdings associated with an account.

<Aside type="note">
  Try it yourself! You can customize the variables at the bottom of the editor.
</Aside>

{/* <GraphQLEditor query={"type":"mdxJsxAttributeValueExpression","value":"`query GetAccountNftCollections($address: String) {\ncurrent_collection_ownership_v2_view(\n  where: {owner_address: {_eq: $address}},\n  limit: 1000000,\n  offset: 0,\n  order_by: [{last_transaction_version: desc}, {collection_id: asc}]\n) {\n  collection_id\n  distinct_tokens\n  last_transaction_version\n  owner_address\n  current_collection {\n    collection_id\n    collection_name\n    creator_address\n    current_supply\n    description\n    last_transaction_timestamp\n    last_transaction_version\n    max_supply\n    mutable_description\n    mutable_uri\n    table_handle_v1\n    token_standard\n    total_minted_v2\n    uri\n    __typename\n  }\n  __typename\n}\n}`","data":{"estree":{"type":"Program","start":661,"end":1367,"body":[{"type":"ExpressionStatement","expression":{"type":"TemplateLiteral","start":661,"end":1367,"loc":{"start":{"line":13,"column":9,"offset":661},"end":{"line":43,"column":2,"offset":1367}},"expressions":[],"quasis":[{"type":"TemplateElement","start":662,"end":1366,"loc":{"start":{"line":13,"column":10,"offset":662},"end":{"line":43,"column":1,"offset":1366}},"value":{"raw":"query [{last_transaction_version: desc}, {collection_id: asc}]\n) {\n  collection_id\n  distinct_tokens\n  last_transaction_version\n  owner_address\n  current_collection {\n    collection_id\n */}

#### Variables:

- `$address`: **String** - The Aptos account address for which you want to query NFT collection data. Ex. `"0x8824ebb6e0d60656f6d4d5bbc408805d9ca6b984aad78b16f42b1dae545d6762"`
